page.title: 10Food Lifestyles
page.content: Although "fast food" is popular throughout the country, there is no outlet in the villages, so meals tend to be more traditional. "My best food is fish fingers, baked beans and chips, but I only eat them once a week. But it is not good for you. I've got chickens and I like their meat. But if you don't bake it right you get an illness. In the olden days they only had chicken on Christmas Day or very special days.I'm glad I wasn't living then. And they only had peas in the summer because they were not ready in the winter. I like peas a lot. I know how to cook peas. All you do is take some peas out of the freezer and put them in a pan of hot water and wait for them to be ready to eat. When I cook potatoes I peel them, put some salt on them and put them in the pan." Richard.
